title: Basil acquitted from 2015 Samurdhi gratuity case
content: The Kaduwela Magistrate's Court today (28) acquitted Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa of all charges related to the 2015 Samurdhi gratuity case.The case was filed in relation to an alleged misappropriation of public funds within the Divi Neguma Department.Earlier this month, Rajapaksa and former Divi Neguma Department director general Kithsiri Ranawaka were acquitted from charges emanating from the distribution of five million almanacs in 2015, on orders of Colombo high court judge Damith Thotawatte.The two were accused of having misappropriated Rs. 29.4 million from the Departmentâ€™s funds to print the almanacs with the picture of ex-president Mahinda Rajapaksa in the run-up to the 2015 presidential election.
